Secondly, the money is used to pay the wages of the individuals who actually work to make the repairs. Finally, the money collected is used to purchase the necessary equipment to do the repairs.

This can also help to reduce the number of accidents on the roads, as better road conditions can lead to more predictable driving conditions.
